issues.name: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
issues.description: Missing HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS): Enforces secure HTTPS connections
issues.recommendation: Add strict-transport-security header to improve security

issues.name: Content Security Policy (CSP)
issues.description: Missing Content Security Policy (CSP): Controls resource loading to prevent XSS
issues.recommendation: Add content-security-policy header to improve security

issues.name: X-Frame-Options
issues.description: Missing X-Frame-Options: Prevents page embedding in frames (clickjacking protection)
issues.recommendation: Add x-frame-options header to improve security

issues.name: X-Content-Type-Options
issues.description: Missing X-Content-Type-Options: Prevents MIME type sniffing
issues.recommendation: Add x-content-type-options header to improve security
